import{Box,FormControl,InputLabel,MenuItem,Pagination,Select,Typography}from'@mui/material';import React from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PaginationControls=_ref=>{let{currentPage,totalPages,pageSize,totalElements,onPageChange,onPageSizeChange,pageSizeOptions=[5,10,20,50]}=_ref;const handlePageChange=(_,value)=>{onPageChange(value-1);// Material UI Pagination is 1 based! backend is 0 based!
};const handlePageSizeChange=event=>{onPageSizeChange(event.target.value);};if(totalPages<=1){return null;}const startItem=currentPage*pageSize+1;const endItem=Math.min((currentPage+1)*pageSize,totalElements);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',mt:4,flexWrap:'wrap',gap:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"text.secondary",children:["Showing ",startItem,"-",endItem," of ",totalElements," items"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',gap:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormControl,{size:"small",sx:{minWidth:80},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputLabel,{children:"Size"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{value:pageSize,label:"Size",onChange:handlePageSizeChange,children:pageSizeOptions.map(size=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{value:size,children:size},size))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination,{count:totalPages,page:currentPage+1,onChange:handlePageChange,color:"primary",showFirstButton:true,showLastButton:true})]})]});};export default PaginationControls;
